nodes.text: Melford was a Lianna city that was located on the northern coast of the Anai continent. Generally considered the prettiest city on the planet with well manicured lawns and generally clean air, it was the site of the Imperial-controlled Melford Star Academy. Melford was also home to a large commerical and military spaceport with a full complement of TIE/LN starfighters and training craft.
